title: Better Liquidity Provisioning: Panoptic's Single-Sided, IL-Free, Passive LP Model
description: Discover the advantages of Panoptic's innovative approach to liquidity providing, offering a single-sided, no impermanent loss, passive model that simplifies earnings for liquidity providers in the evolving world of decentralized exchanges.

title: Epoch 1 Closed
description: Panoptic announces the close of its first trading competition during its beta DeFi options platform launch.

title: Panoptic Community Program

title: Perpetual Options Pioneer Launches Beta Platform

title: 0DTEs on Uniswap – Insights from On-Chain LP data
description: LP positions are held for a short period of time – typically less than a day. We explore widths and holding time from the POV that LPs are option sellers with an implied expiry date.
